trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANYOK123_05358_SEQ_00<tab>Vuyargur would see the altar polished to a breathless sheen.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANYOK123_05358_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the ardent altarkeeper at Zirgorteh the Open-armed.
TEXT_BANYOK123_05358_TODO_01<tab>Use the polishing powder at the designated locations.
TEXT_BANYOK123_05358_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Vuyargur.
TEXT_BANYOK123_05358_VUYARGUR_000_001<tab>Ever since you helped us to restore the Breathless Altar, we have seen an influx of visitors come to pay their respects.
TEXT_BANYOK123_05358_VUYARGUR_000_002<tab>As such, the keeper in charge has grown rather...<var 1A 02 /var>impassioned<var 1A 01 /var> about its maintenance.
TEXT_BANYOK123_05358_VUYARGUR_000_003<tab>For that reason have I acquired this polishing powder from a merchant. Will you go and see it safely delivered into her hands?
TEXT_BANYOK123_05358_VUYARGUR_000_004<tab>The altarkeeper has requested more polishing powder for the Breathless Altar. Would you kindly take it to her, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
TEXT_BANYOK123_05358_VUYARGUR_000_005<tab>And if she asks you to assist in its application...well, you won't mind, I hope.
TEXT_BANYOK123_05358_HAIDANYOK05358_000_010<tab>Polishing powder! Oh, thank you for bringing this to me! I was just admiring the crystals.
TEXT_BANYOK123_05358_HAIDANYOK05358_000_011<tab>Pretty, aren't they? The hue differs from glowstone, but it is said to signify rich memories of the time when this place slept beneath the sea.

TEXT_BANYOK123_05358_HAIDANYOK05358_000_012<tab>And according to Dartorgor's living sepulchre, the snow spirits are drawn to them, too, because they glint like ice in the sunlight! Isn't that something?
TEXT_BANYOK123_05358_HAIDANYOK05358_000_013<tab>......
TEXT_BANYOK123_05358_HAIDANYOK05358_000_014<tab>Sorry, what were we talking about? ...Right! The crystals! Need to polish them!
TEXT_BANYOK123_05358_HAIDANYOK05358_000_015<tab>You know, it would mean much to the Breathless Altar if a storied warrior were to do the honors. Take this powder and polish to your heart's content!
TEXT_BANYOK123_05358_HAIDANYOK05358_000_016<tab>The crystals would be most grateful if you were to assist me.
TEXT_BANYOK123_05358_HAIDANYOK05358_000_017<tab>You may report back to Vuyargur now, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. As altarkeeper, I shall attend to the rest personally.

TEXT_BANYOK123_05358_VUYARGUR_000_020<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I must thank you for not only delivering the polishing agent, but aiding in the maintenance work as well.
TEXT_BANYOK123_05358_VUYARGUR_000_021<tab>After lying forgotten for all those years, the Breathless Altar has been raised high by the hands of Yok Huy and many others such as you.
TEXT_BANYOK123_05358_VUYARGUR_000_022<tab>Zeal for crystals aside, the keeper's dedication motivates all of us to do our part in looking after the altar.
TEXT_BANYOK123_05358_VUYARGUR_000_023<tab>I hope you will help us to preserve its radiance, that we may enjoy the snow spirits' favor for years to come.
